Title: Establishes a full year youth and young adult employment immersion program
Summary: Establishes a full year youth and young adult employment immersion program under the office of temporary and disability assistance for persons aged sixteen to twenty-four who have an income below two hundred sixty-five percent of the federal poverty line.
LawCode: Add ยง131-y, amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a full year youth and young adult employment immersion program
